ios.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/eastestsexample.xcworkspace -scheme eastestsexample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -arch x86_64 -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/eastestsexample.xcworkspace -scheme eastestsexample -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -arch x86_64 -derivedDataPath ios/build
